consoleData.description: Auto-director chooses best view modes while spectating

uiData.label: spec_autodirector
uiData.helperText: Auto-director chooses best view modes while spectating

consoleData.description: Looks at the target player's center, instead of his eye position, in chase came mode

uiData.label: spec_centerchasecam
uiData.helperText: Looks at the target player's center, instead of his eye position, in chase came mode

consoleData.description: Time to decay glow from 1.0 to spec_glow_silent_factor after spec_glow_full_time.

uiData.label: spec_glow_decay_time
uiData.helperText: Time to decay glow from 1.0 to spec_glow_silent_factor after spec_glow_full_time.

consoleData.description: Noisy players stay at full brightness for this long.

uiData.label: spec_glow_full_time
uiData.helperText: Noisy players stay at full brightness for this long.

consoleData.description: Noisy player xray glow scaling (pop when noise is made).  Make >1 to add a 'spike' to noise-making players

uiData.label: spec_glow_spike_factor
uiData.helperText: Noisy player xray glow scaling (pop when noise is made).  Make >1 to add a 'spike' to noise-making players

consoleData.description: Time for noisy player glow 'spike' to show that they made noise very recently.

uiData.label: spec_glow_spike_time
uiData.helperText: Time for noisy player glow 'spike' to show that they made noise very recently.

consoleData.description: If set to 1, you can see player outlines and name IDs through walls - who you can see depends on your team and mode

uiData.label: spec_show_xray
uiData.helperText: If set to 1, you can see player outlines and name IDs through walls - who you can see depends on your team and mode

consoleData.description: If set to 1, map voting and spectator view use the raw number keys instead of the weapon binds (slot1, slot2, etc).

uiData.label: spec_usenumberkeys_nobinds
uiData.helperText: If set to 1, map voting and spectator view use the raw number keys instead of the weapon binds (slot1, slot2, etc).
